reviews.text: I was trying to book a move out clean within a weeks notice. SCS was quick to respond with a reasonable rate. All around great communication and excellent service. Will definitely book again if needed.

I am completely satisfied with the weekly cleaning. They are always on time and pleasant. If I need any particular thing cleaned in detail they make sure to follow through. I highly recommend Santos Cleaning Solutions and think you'll be pleased!

Santos Cleaning Solutions is a wonderful company. Trust is a HUGE deal when allowing someone into your home. Not only do they do an amazing job EVERY time, but they are always in a good mood. We trust Santos Cleaning Solutions into our home even if we are not there.
